SELECT to_char( date_trunc('day', create_time), 'yyyy-MM-DD' ) AS label,count(1) as number
FROM rf_pad_status_log WHERE create_time >= to_date('${begin}','yyyy-MM-DD') AND create_time < ( (to_date('${end}','yyyy-MM-DD')+ integer '1') ) AND pad_status = '2'
group by label,pad_code

select count(1) from (select pad_id ,count(1) from rf_pad_user_game_use t left join rf_game g on t.game_id=g.game_id where game_name like '九阴真经%' group by pad_id)ttt
SELECT count(1) as number,to_char(date_trunc('${type}',create_time), '${formart}') as label from log_pad where create_time >= to_date('${begin}','yyyy-MM-DD') and create_time < (to_date('${end}','yyyy-MM-DD')+ integer '1')
and ${where}
group by label order by label asc
